sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import {
    HeroContainer,
    HeroBg,
    VideoBg,
    ImageBg,
    ArrowForward,
    Row,
    HeroP,
    HeroTitle,
    HeroBtnWrapper,
    ArrowRight, Mockup, ColumnLeft, ColumnRight
} from '../Hero/HeroElements'
import { Button } from '../../Utilities/ButtonElements'
import Video from '../../Videos/video.mp4'
import hero_bg from '../../Images/bg.svg'
import mockup from '../../Images/www.png'


import MovingText from 'react-moving-text'

const AnimationsForChaining = ["swing", "flipSlowDown", "fadeOutToBottom", "jelly"]


const Hero = () => {

    const [hover, setHover] = useState(false);

    const [ animationIndex, setAnimationIndex ] = useState(0)
    const [ animationType, setAnimationType ] = useState(AnimationsForChaining[0])

    const onHover = () => {
        setHover(!hover);
    }

    const handleChainAnimation = () => {
        setCounter(animationIndex+1)
        setAnimationType(selectedItems[animationIndex+1])
    }

    return (
        <MovingText
            onAnimationEnd={handleChainAnimation}
            type={animationType}
            duration="1000ms"
            timing="linear"
            iteration={1}>
            MovingText
        </MovingText>
    )

    return (
        <>
            <HeroContainer>
                <HeroBg>
                    {/*<VideoBg autoPlay loop muted src={Video} type='video/mp4' />*/}
                    <ImageBg src={hero_bg} />
                </HeroBg>

                <Row>

                    <ColumnLeft>
                        <HeroTitle>WHEELY IS A WEB 3 APPLICATION</HeroTitle>
                        <HeroP>Users can earn tokens by driving any mode of transport.
                        </HeroP>
                        <HeroP>Whether it's a bike, scooter, car, or even public transportation,
                        </HeroP>
                        <HeroP>you can earn game token.
                        </HeroP>
                        <HeroBtnWrapper>
                            <Button
                                to="signup"
                                onMouseEnter={onHover}
                                onMouseLeave={onHover}
                                primary="true"
                                dark="true"
                            >
                                PRESALE {hover ? <ArrowForward /> : <ArrowRight />}
                            </Button>

                        </HeroBtnWrapper>
                    </ColumnLeft>

                    <ColumnRight>
                        <Mockup src={mockup} />

                    </ColumnRight>


                </Row>



            </HeroContainer>
        </>
    )
}

export default Hero
